page.title: 15MY SPARE TIME
page.content: IN MY SPARE TIME I MOSTLY WATCH TELEVISION. MY FIRST CHOICE IS "TOP OF THE POPS". IT IS A GOOD PROGRAMME TO SEE WHAT THE SONGS OF THE GROUPS ARE LIKE. IT IS PRODUCED BY DIFFERENT DJ'S EVERYWEEK. MY SECOND CHOICE IS THE "TUBE". IT IS ALSO ABOUT POP MUSIC BUT IT IS BETTER BECAUSE THE GROUPS ARE ALWAYS LIVE IN THE STUDIO AND IT IS PRESENTED BY JOOLS HOLLAND AND LESLEY ASH. MY THIRD CHOICE IS "JUST GOOD FRIENDS" WHICH IS ABOUT TWO ADULTS,PENNY AND VINCENT WHO WERE GOING TO MARRY BUT HE DIDN'T TURN UP FOR THE WEDDING. THEY DID NOT SEE EACH OTHER FOR FIVE YEARS AND ARE NOW TRYING TO BE GOOD FRIENDS AGAIN. MY LAST CHOICE IS "IN SICKNESS AND IN HEALTH" AND IS ABOUT TWO PEOPLE WHO ARE GROWIING OLD.
